com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swaption

Interface NormalVolatilitySwaptionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NormalVolatilityExpiryTenorSwaptionProvider

    public interface NormalVolatilitySwaptionProvider
    Volatility environment for swaption in the normal or Bachelier model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FixedIborSwapConvention getConvention()
      Returns the convention of the swap for which the data is valid.
      ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
      Returns the valuation date.
      double getVolatility(ZonedDateTime expiryDate, double tenor, double strike, double forwardRate)
      Returns the normal volatility.
      double relativeTime(ZonedDateTime date)
      Converts a time and date to a relative year fraction.
      SurfaceCurrencyParameterSensitivity surfaceCurrencyParameterSensitivity(SwaptionSensitivity sensitivity)
      Computes the sensitivity to the nodes of the underlying volatility objects
      double tenor(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Returns the tenor of the swap based on its start date and end date.

    • Method Detail

      • getVolatility

        double getVolatility(ZonedDateTime expiryDate,
                     double tenor,
                     double strike,
                     double forwardRate)
        Returns the normal volatility.
        Parameters:
        expiryDate - the option expiry
        tenor - the swaption tenor in years
        strike - the option strike rate
        forwardRate - the forward rate of the underlying swap
        Returns:
        the volatility

      • getConvention

        FixedIborSwapConvention getConvention()
        Returns the convention of the swap for which the data is valid.
        Returns:
        the convention

      • surfaceCurrencyParameterSensitivity

        SurfaceCurrencyParameterSensitivity surfaceCurrencyParameterSensitivity(SwaptionSensitivity sensitivity)
        Computes the sensitivity to the nodes of the underlying volatility objects

        The underlying object is typically curve, surface or cube.

        Parameters:
        sensitivity - the point sensitivity
        Returns:
        the node sensitivity

      • relativeTime

        double relativeTime(ZonedDateTime date)
        Converts a time and date to a relative year fraction.

        When the date is after the valuation date (and potentially time), the returned number is negative.

        Parameters:
        date - the date/time to find the relative year fraction of
        Returns:
        the relative year fraction

      • tenor

        double tenor(LocalDate startDate,
             LocalDate endDate)
        Returns the tenor of the swap based on its start date and end date.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date
        Returns:
        the tenor

      • getValuationDateTime

        ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
        Returns the valuation date. All data items in this provider are calibrated for this date.
        Returns:
        the date
